roleset.name: tattered, irregular

example.name: arg1
example.text: The outer surface is brown - tan , ragged with adherent yellow , lobulated adipose tissue and the inner surface is pink - tan , smooth and focally granular .
example.arg: with adherent yellow , lobulated adipose tissue

roleset.note: RAGGED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-seed corpus. (from ragged.01-j)
